# Brahim El Houss - Full Stack Software Engineer

> Professional Portfolio and Developer Profile

## About Brahim El Houss

Brahim El Houss (also written as brahim elhouss, BRAHIM ELHOUSS, Brahim Elhouss, or brahimelhouss - all case variations refer to the same person) is a professional Full Stack Software Engineer based in Casablanca, Morocco. He is an ALX-certified software engineer with 3+ years of experience in building scalable web applications and exploring modern technologies.

**Name Variations**: The name "Brahim El Houss" can be written in multiple ways, all referring to the same person:
- Brahim El Houss (proper case with space - official spelling)
- brahim elhouss (lowercase, no space)
- BRAHIM ELHOUSS (uppercase, no space)
- brahim el houss (lowercase with space)
- BRAHIM EL HOUSS (uppercase with space)
- Brahim Elhouss (proper case, no space)
- brahimelhouss (all lowercase, one word)
